comments.about: aditional config for custom classes. it's ignored by custom_classes vue plugin.
comments.themes: set the current list of themes that need selectors support and its order. set it from more specific to default.

mode.multi: select as much elements as possible from all listed selectors
mode.firstSelector: select as much elements as possible from first selector that has elements
mode.single: select first element found from first selector that has elements

nav_user.description: Selector for the navigation bar where the cart dropdown lives

generic_hide.description: Custom class used to hide elements when the adapter is active.

quick_search.description: Custom class to quick search container

all_mobile_menu_account_section.description: Selector for mobile navigation in account page

all_mobile_menu_account_section_fab.description: Selector for mobile navigation on FAB store.

account_manage_subscriptions.description: Class added to the manage subscription link. This class is added by the adapter

account_navbar_section.description: Selector for navigation bar on account page. Used to insert the manage subscription link

cart_view.description: Selector to check is the page is cart view

additional_checkout_buttons.description: Selector for additional checkout buttons present in the cart page

cart_hide_subscription.description: Used to hide elements in cart page, preview dropdown and product page

cart_line_item_id_element.description: The element that contains the cart line item id

cart_items.description: Selector for the cart content where all the items are displayed

cart_line_item.description: Selector for cart item, need to be present on each cart item

cart_line_item_name.description: Selector fot the cart line item name. Used to display the S&S information in the cart page

cart_line_item_total.description: Selector for cart item total price

cart_line_item_quantity.description: Selector for cart item quantity input

cart_line_item_one_time.description: Selector for one time product presented in cart

cart_line_item_subscribe.description: Selector for subscription product presented in cart

cart_coupon_applied.description: Selector for cart coupon element when coupon is applied

cart_coupon_applied_value.description: Selector for cart coupon element value when coupon is applied

cart_gift_wrapping.description: Selector for cart gift wrapping section

banner.description: Selector for information banner in cart

cart_remove.description: Selector for cart remove button for cart item

cart_dropdown.description: Selector for the cart navigation dropdown element (if dropdown exists), should be the parent class under which the sidebar dropdown lives.

cart_dropdown_inner.description: Selector for inner div of the cart navigation dropdown. Used only for specific themes

cart_dropdown_content.description: Selector for cart navigation dropdown content.

cart_dropdown_qty_controls.description: Selector for cart navigation quantity controls

cart_dropdown_totals.description: Selector for the dropdown total. Required only if is present in the theme

cart_dropdown_checkout.description: Selector for checkout button in cart navigation dropdown

cart_modal_content.description: Selector for the preview modal in product page. Used to check mutations

cart_modal_price.description: Selector for preview modal price in product page.

cart_modal_sub_text.description: Custom class for the subscription information text created by the adapter.

cart_modal_subtotal.description: Selector for preview modal subtotal price.

quick_view.description: Selector to check if a quickview button exist

cart_quick_link.description: Selector for quick add button for a product. Used in home and category page and if is present on the card grid

product_grid.description: Selector for product grid used in home/category page.

product_view.description: Selector to check is the page is product view

product_subscription.description: Selector used to mount the adapter widget

product_price.description: Selector for the product price element

product_id.description: Selector for the product id input in the add to cart form

product_variant_options.description: Selector for the option selectors for a product

product_variant_options_default.description: Selector for the default option selectors for a product. Required only if exist modifiers

product_variant_options_modifier.description: Selector for the modifiers option selectors for a product. Required only if exist modifiers

onetime_button.description: Class for the one time button of the adapter widget

onetime_button_text.description: Class for the one time button text of the adapter widget

onetime_button_price.description: Class for the one time button price of the adapter widget

subscription_button.description: Class for the subscription button of the adapter widget

subscription_button_text.description: Class for the subscription button text of the adapter widget

subscription_button_price.description: Class for the subscription button price of the adapter widget

subscription_checkbox.description: Class for the subscription checkbox of the adapter widget

subscription_checkbox_input.description: Class for the subscription input of the adapter widget

subscription_checkbox_combined_text.description: Class for the subscription checkbox with combined text of the adapter widget

frequency_selector.description: Class for the frequency selector for the adapter widget

frequency_option.description: Class for the frequency option selector for the adapter widget

subscription_details.description: Class for the subscription details inserted in the preview modal and cart page

generic_remove.description: Use this class to remove an element with the adapter
